Balthus Knight Camcud:
Did McCoy give you the responsibility of delivering Supply Items? Let me see... Oh, I can't believe it's true. That picky McCoy trusts you!
Do you know how important supply items are? I make most of the items we need. To fight against the enemies, we need weaponry. Blacksmiths, like me, make the weapons.
That's not all. We also make armor to defend against attacks from the enemies. Armor is also made by Blacksmiths.
Of course, just making it isn't enough. There are other important things.
